metadata.description: Music composed by Louis-François Faur; libretto by Dezède and the baron de Manteuffel; based on Der Edelknabe by J.J. Engel. Cf. Brenner, C.D. French plays, 1700-1789, no. 6159
Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française
metadata.notes: Title page located on front cover. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Worn, damaged pages and cover. Skewed text.
